evolution-graph.description: Highly customizable, animated and responsive evolution graph implementation. The package is used to create flexible data visualizations and present evolution relationships between entities.

react-ts-boilerplate.description: WIP - Boilerplate for React.js applications, built with Mobx as a state manager, Chakra UI as a component library, and Vite as a build tool.

podjs.description: PodJS is an open source podcast app built with Next.js, MobX and Chakra UI. https://podjs.vercel.app

clockify-teams.description: Team management app used to generate warnings and send email reports about collaborator's performance.

react-native-ts-boilerplate.description: WIP - Boilerplate for React Native applications, built with Native Base as a component library and MobX as a state manager.
